subject: Horse Racing
Preakness Stakes
Rachel Alexandra (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: The scheme to keep Rachel Alexandra out of the Preakness was likely derailed when Marylou Whitney said that if Rachel Alexandra was still 15th on the eligibility list she would not run her colt, Luv Gov.
snippet: The scheme to keep Rachel Alexandra out of the Preakness was likely derailed when Marylou Whitney said that if Rachel Alexandra was still 15th on the eligibility list she would not run her colt, Luv Gov.
